name: Short adventures
description:
this game is about a dwarf who is on the hunt for a purple gem. this game is still in early access and may become discontinued. 

the game is a rouge-like platformer game and the file below or above is made for Windows.

the controls are the arrowkeys for movement, leftclick or collision for interactions and tab for fullscreen.     Please have a good gaming  session and a good day.  :)

(you can also play for free on flowjob.io if you play on chromebook, my game page is called '' wee corn snek''. Good day.)
